mapper.select: SELECT ATTENDANCE_NO, EMP_NO, CLOCK_IN, CLOCK_OUT, TRUNC(CLOCK_IN) AS WORKDAY, STATUS, CASE WHEN CLOCK_OUT IS NOT NULL THEN FLOOR((CLOCK_OUT - CLOCK_IN) * 24) || '시간 ' || FLOOR(MOD((CLOCK_OUT - CLOCK_IN) * 24 * 60, 60)) || '분' ELSE NULL END AS WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY ATTENDANCE_NO DESC

SELECT a.ATTENDANCE_NO, a.EMP_NO, m.MEM_NAME AS EMP_NAME, a.CLOCK_IN, a.CLOCK_OUT, TRUNC(a.CLOCK_IN) AS WORKDAY, a.STATUS, CASE WHEN a.CLOCK_OUT IS NOT NULL THEN FLOOR((a.CLOCK_OUT - a.CLOCK_IN) * 24) || '시간 ' || FLOOR(MOD((a.CLOCK_OUT - a.CLOCK_IN) * 24 * 60, 60)) || '분' ELSE NULL END AS WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE a JOIN MEMBER m ON a.EMP_NO = m.EMP_NO WHERE m.STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND m.POSITION = 'employee' ORDER BY a.ATTENDANCE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE ( ATTENDANCE_NO, EMP_NO, CLOCK_IN, STATUS ) VALUES ( ATTENDANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{clockIn}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET CLOCK_OUT = #{clockOut}, STATUS = #{status} WHERE ATTENDANCE_NO = (SELECT ATTENDANCE_NO FROM ( SELECT ATTENDANCE_NO FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND CLOCK_OUT IS NULL ORDER BY ATTENDANCE_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND CLOCK_OUT IS NULL AND TRUNC(CLOCK_IN) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT ATTENDANCE_NO, CLOCK_IN, CLOCK_OUT, STATUS, CASE WHEN CLOCK_OUT IS NOT NULL THEN FLOOR((CLOCK_OUT - CLOCK_IN) * 24) || '시간 ' || FLOOR(MOD((CLOCK_OUT - CLOCK_IN) * 24 * 60, 60)) || '분' ELSE NULL END AS WORKTIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY CLOCK_OUT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM ATTENDANCE A JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.EMP_NO = A.EMP_NO) WHERE TRUNC(CLOCK_IN) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND A.STATUS = 'W' AND M.STORE_ID = #{storeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND STATUS = 'Y'
